content: Please help on finding an IG on payment refunds. Is it supported on fhir?

We have an Invoice and PaymentNotification resource. Those could possibly be relevant for soliciting payment refunds. However, I'm not aware of an existing IG that covers that space. @Simone Heckmann @Paul Knapp

Financial Management is working on updating the PaymentReconciliation resource to support Patient payments in addition to Insurer payments so I this that could address the refund as well. Please come to a Financial Management call Thursdays at 1 eastern (Dec 17 would be a good choice)or Tuesday at 11 Eastern https://us02web.zoom.us/j/82031005986 Passcode: 098894.
